attributes.action: Call a coalition government into being for remainder of this term of parliament
attributes.additional_details:
Half our nation will be disenfranchised by whoever takes over as PM.
European problems have been caused in a great part by Mr Farage and the far right failing to represent the national interest in Europe.
Our nation has rising levels of hate crime and racism.
Our financial markets are in flux.
We are on a war footing from an economic perspective.
During WW2 national unity was achieved by one multiparty coalition.
This would unify and strengthen government and be inclusive to the full population.
attributes.background: 23rd June 2016 a hugely divisive vote was held which sees our great nation riven by party in fighting which replicates the national situation. A few minutes ago we were represented in the most disgraceful manner by Mr Farage to the EU Parliament. We need to find unity and that starts with Government
